doc:
Corey Carrier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corey_Carrier 0 Corey Thomas Carrier (born August 20, 1980) is an American former child actor, also known as just "Core." He is best known as playing Indiana Jones, aged 8–10, in The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles. Carrier was born in Middleborough, Massachusetts to Thomas and Carleen. He has a younger sister named Bethany. He attended an acting school at The Priscilla Beach Children's Theatre Workshop. His hobbies include baseball, gymnastics, wrestling, fencing, guitar, ice skating and basketball. He attended Clark University in Worcester, Massachusetts as an undergraduate.
